purpose: Track errors, solutions, and lessons learned during development

commonErrors.description: Frequently encountered errors and their solutions

entries.solution: Use aiosqlite properly with await db.execute() instead of synchronous calls
entries.prevention: Always use await with aiosqlite operations, never mix sync/async database calls

entries.context: Vector similarity search queries in SQLite with vss extension
entries.solution: Use MATCH operator instead of vec_distance() function for vector searches
entries.prevention: Reference sqlite-vss documentation for correct query syntax

entries.context: Vector similarity search queries without proper constraints
entries.solution: Add 'AND k = ?' parameter to MATCH queries to specify result count
entries.prevention: Always include k parameter in vector search queries

entries.error: Model loading delay on first request
entries.context: Embedding model initialization causes slow first response
entries.solution: Model loading happens on first embedding generation - expected behavior
entries.prevention: Consider warming up models during server startup for production

integrationChallenges.description: Issues with third-party services and libraries

entries.context: Loading sqlite-vss extension for vector operations
entries.solution: Use SELECT load_extension() SQL command instead of direct Python extension loading
entries.prevention: Always use SQL-based extension loading for better compatibility

entries.context: Running development server blocks terminal session
entries.solution: Use nohup and background process with PID tracking: 'nohup uv run docsrs-mcp > server.log 2>&1 & echo $!'
entries.prevention: Always run servers in background for development, save PID for cleanup

entries.details: WAL mode enabled for better concurrency in multi-user scenarios
Embeddings cached in SQLite for reuse across sessions
entries.impact: Significant performance improvement for repeated queries

errorTemplate.prevention: How to avoid this error in the future

sqliteVss.workaround: Implement chunking or use alternative vector DB for large crates

rustdocJson.issue: Not all crates have rustdoc JSON available
rustdocJson.impact: Cannot provide documentation for older crates
rustdocJson.workaround: Return graceful error message without attempting local build

windowsCompatibility.workaround: Fallback to standard asyncio event loop on Windows

ruff.description: Exclusive linting and formatting tool for this project
integrationTips: Add ruff extension to VS Code for real-time feedback
Configure pre-commit hook: 'uv run ruff check --fix && uv run ruff format'
CI should run both 'ruff check' and 'ruff format --check'
Use --fix flag in development, never in CI
Ruff auto-fixes are safe and preserve code semantics
performanceNotes: No need for separate tools or complex configuration
